summary: An example that demonstrates how to use the cuGraph accelerated relational graph convolution layer for entity classification on multi‑relational RDF datasets. It defines a relational GCN model with utilities for handling node degree statistics and runs mini‑batch training, highlighting a 1.5–2× speed improvement over the standard DGL implementation.
business_intent: Showcase a high‑performance solution for developers and researchers to accelerate relational graph neural network training on CUDA devices, enabling faster experimentation and deployment for entity classification tasks in heterogeneous graph data.
